headline.main: Study Finds High Psychosis Risk Among Europe's Refugee Migrants
headline.print_headline: Study Finds High Psychosis Risk Among Europe's Refugee Migrants

docs.snippet: Refugees fleeing war, violence and persecution have a much higher risk of developing psychotic illnesses like schizophrenia than people who migrate for economic or social reasons, according to research published on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Refugees fleeing war, violence and persecution have a much higher risk of developing psychotic illnesses like schizophrenia than people who migrate for economic or social reasons, according to research published on Tuesday.

headline.main: Agricultural Truck Hit Track Where Amtrak Train Derailed in Kansas
headline.print_headline: Agricultural Truck Hit Track Where Amtrak Train Derailed in Kansas

docs.snippet: Federal safety officials on Tuesday said an agricultural truck had earlier struck the railroad tracks just 25 feet (7.6 meters) from where an Amtrak passenger train derailed in Kansas this week, injuring some three dozen people....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal safety officials on Tuesday said an agricultural truck had earlier struck the railroad tracks just 25 feet (7.6 meters) from where an Amtrak passenger train derailed in Kansas this week, injuring some three dozen people.

headline.main: Morocco Says to Cut U.N. Western Sahara Mission After Ban Remarks
headline.print_headline: Morocco Says to Cut U.N. Western Sahara Mission After Ban Remarks

docs.snippet: Morocco's government said on Tuesday it would cut staff at the United Nations' Western Sahara mission and threatened to pull out of United Nations peacekeeping missions after "unacceptable" comments by U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-moon about the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Morocco's government said on Tuesday it would cut staff at the United Nations' Western Sahara mission and threatened to pull out of United Nations peacekeeping missions after "unacceptable" comments by U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-moon about the disputed region.

headline.main: 'Divergent' Heroine Seeks Answers as Society Crumbles in 'Allegiant'
headline.print_headline: 'Divergent' Heroine Seeks Answers as Society Crumbles in 'Allegiant'

docs.snippet: After surviving the breakdown of society and uprising of rebels, "Divergent" heroine Tris Prior is leading the quest for answers in the new film, "Allegiant."...
docs.lead_paragraph: After surviving the breakdown of society and uprising of rebels, "Divergent" heroine Tris Prior is leading the quest for answers in the new film, "Allegiant."

headline.main: Exit Poll: Trump Wins Broad Support in FL, Clinton Wins 4
headline.print_headline: Exit Poll: Trump Wins Broad Support in FL, Clinton Wins 4

docs.snippet: Donald Trump claimed Florida, the biggest delegate haul of Tuesday night's five Republican primary elections, by sweeping nearly all categories of voters— men and women, rich and poor, the highly educated and those without college degrees....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump claimed Florida, the biggest delegate haul of Tuesday night's five Republican primary elections, by sweeping nearly all categories of voters— men and women, rich and poor, the highly educated and those without college degrees.

headline.main: U.S. Law Firm Says Will Pursue VW Claims in Europe
headline.print_headline: U.S. Law Firm Says Will Pursue VW Claims in Europe

docs.snippet: U.S. law firm Hausfeld said it will pursue claims of European customers harmed by Volkswagen's emissions scandal, adding to the German automaker's mounting legal challenges....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. law firm Hausfeld said it will pursue claims of European customers harmed by Volkswagen's emissions scandal, adding to the German automaker's mounting legal challenges.

headline.main: Grand Jury Findings Against Franciscan Order in Pennsylvania

docs.snippet: Three members of the Franciscan Friars are being charged with one count each of endangering the welfare of children and criminal conspiracy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three members of the Franciscan Friars are being charged with one count each of endangering the welfare of children and criminal conspiracy.

headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Voters Head to Polls in Delegate-Rich Primaries
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Voters Head to Polls in Delegate-Rich Primaries

docs.snippet: Voters in five states headed to polling places on a delegate-rich day of voting that could clarify the nomination fights in both parties....
docs.lead_paragraph: Voters in five states headed to polling places on a delegate-rich day of voting that could clarify the nomination fights in both parties.

headline.main: Trump Says Foreign Policy Team Still Not Ready
headline.print_headline: Trump Says Foreign Policy Team Still Not Ready

docs.snippet: Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump acknowledged on Tuesday he does not yet have a foreign policy team, and        three former U.S. military and intelligence officials who have endorsed him are little known in either the Republican ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump acknowledged on Tuesday he does not yet have a foreign policy team, and        three former U.S. military and intelligence officials who have endorsed him are little known in either the Republican Party or the wider foreign policy community.

headline.main: Federal Government Open Wednesday in Washington Despite Subway Shutdown
headline.print_headline: Federal Government Open Wednesday in Washington Despite Subway Shutdown

docs.snippet: The federal government in the Washington, D.C., area will be open on Wednesday, despite a safety shutdown of the city's subway system that is likely to cause a commuting nightmare....
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal government in the Washington, D.C., area will be open on Wednesday, despite a safety shutdown of the city's subway system that is likely to cause a commuting nightmare.
